value: hello YouTube ah my name is Daniel Lee
and I am making a sequel or a part two
to my video entitled wrong Paul at the
crossroads I had a comment somebody who
asked if I could give a sample of what
I'm planning to preach outside the
Republican National Convention in
September I've already received messages
from three different individuals who are
interested in sending me money to make
the trip to Minnesota and to stay there
for a week during the the republican
national convention so i think if these
people follow through i think i
definitely have a good chance of
fulfilling what my video proposed and
that is of course to stand in front of
the National Republican convention in
September and stand out in front of the
convention center I don't know I don't
know how close I can get to the
convention center because I know there's
probably going to be freedom of speech
restrictions which is typical
unfortunately in the day and age we live
in but I have quite a bit of experience
I've been street preaching and campus
preaching outside the open air for about
10 years now so I have a lot of
experience with dealing with the police
with getting permits I've been on
campuses in the United States where I've
had to actually get permits so if I have
to get some permits or whatever that's
fine I might even try to get a some sort
of special permit so that i can bring up
a bullhorn amplification so that I don't
have to strain my voice as much that
might be good but in any case i plan to
stand out in front of the convention
center hopefully in a place where the
delegates will be walking by and I can
then preach to them as they're walking
inside of course I'm not going to know
which delegates are Ron Paul delegates
and which delegates are McCain delegates
but i'm just going to preach to every
single delegate or every single person I
see walking into the convention center
and say hey if you're a delegate well
let's see
first of all let me give some background
of Who I am because that was another
question people asses they want to know
more who I am my name is Daniel Lee I
live in Portland Oregon as I said I've
been preaching outside in the open air
for about 10 years now I've preached on
campuses all across the nation from UCLA
to University of Arizona or arizona
university of phoenix to universities in
alabama oklahoma of course here in
oregon so i have a lot of experience
with outdoor public speaking i usually
get crowds of well anywhere from 20
people to I've had crabs as big as 400
or 500 people before just lifting at my
voice and of course preaching religion
the Bible but in this case I'll be
preaching Ron Paul so that's a little
background on who I am um why am I doing
this pretty obvious I think it's the
last sort of attempt or chance that that
I personally have as an American citizen
to try to get Ron Paul elected president
and you know i mean we're talking about
a little over a thousand delegates that
will be attending this convention and if
i can project my voice outside of that
convention center and if I can convince
even twenty to twenty-five percent of
the delegates that are currently set to
vote for McCain if I can convince twenty
to twenty-five percent of them which is
not all that much I can convince that
many to abstain from the first round of
voting then we could very possibly have
a brokered convention so my goal will be
to try to convince as many delegates as
possible to not vote in the first round
to give Ron Paul a chance the nomination
so what will I actually be preaching
well when I go out and I preach on
campuses college campuses I don't it's
not like a pastor in a church I don't
like prepare a sermon or write out notes
or create an outline or anything like
that I just pretty much go out to preach
and I just start preaching on whatever I
might use I might reference a turn event
topic that's going on in politics or
world events or something and I'll just
go i'll just start preaching and usually
I'll have interaction
students and it'll just go from there so
i don't really pre-plan anything so I
I'm probably gonna just stick to that
because that's I just best has at
thinking on my feet um it's like I
didn't plan what I was going to say for
this YouTube I'm just thinking on my
feet so I'm probably not gonna just you
know I'm not gonna have any notes or

to say something like well of course I'm
inside right now so obviously I'm not

I do have a very loud voice I know how

voice I've been able to preach where

project my voice um so I probably just
say something like you know attention
Republican delegates you're about to go
inside to vote for the Republican
nominee for the president united states
do you think John McCain can win I tell

over seventy percent of the american

you as a Republican delegate should not

Constitution the Constitution that says
that the Congress is supposed to vote
for two to declare war Congress never

candidate who is against the war and
that is wrong Paul and you know I'll go
and more into that well of course you
know granted depending on how long i

if you really want to elect a Republican

he's the only one talking about

actually that's a really good idea you

that's a pretty good idea of course you

my strategy i'm going to try to have
